name: politico
text: Welcome to the final night of the RNC. Speaking tonight: Donald Trump, Mitch McConnell, Ben Carson, Tom Cotton, Ivanka Trump, and more https://t.co/hnBY9Z0ftz https://t.co/GCuCZJifpm

name: politico
text:
President Trump said today that he considered pushing back his RNC address tonight, but he decided to stick with the original plan after "we got a little bit lucky" with the storm

https://t.co/rBW8N9nfOp

name: politico
text:
The convention begins soon, at 8:30 p.m. ET.

We‚Äôre pregaming right now with our pre-show Foursquare, in which our reporters provide analysis and context to break down where we are and what to expect. https://t.co/U9TllgdZSA

name: politico
text:
After trolling Republicans throughout their convention, the Biden campaign has pulled its final act of the week: acquiring the web domain https://t.co/VNmEVUyAPQ

https://t.co/AzCddz8kea

name: politico
text:
Prosecutors today charged a 17-year-old in the fatal shooting of two protesters and the wounding of a third in Kenosha, Wisconsin, during a night of unrest following the weekend police shooting of Jacob Blake

https://t.co/RKLQuY0z0e

name: politico
text:
It's the final night of the RNC. President Trump will close out the convention by formally accepting the nomination and delivering a scathing speech against Joe Biden.

Follow our reporters' live analysis
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
At least 19 former top Trump administration officials in total have broken publicly with their former boss in one form or another. 

And several have already lent their names to various Republicans-for-Biden efforts https://t.co/pbuElvhtHN

name: politico
text:
A video at the RNC, featuring former Democrats backing Trump, is a direct response to the DNC's efforts to highlight support from former/current Republicans over the past couple weeks, says @AliceOllstein.

More RNC live analysis: 
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
RT @ec_schneider: RNC counter-programming the Dems push to spotlight Rs-turned-Biden (from DNC speakers to fmr staffers for McCain, Romney) voters with voters of their own who are "Democrats Now Supporting Trump." 

One says that Dems are trying to get voters "hooked on free money."RNC counter-programming the Dems push to spotlight Rs-turned-Biden (from DNC speakers to fmr staffers for McCain, R‚Ä¶ https://t.co/uke5940VBZ

name: politico
text: President Trump will formally accept the Republican presidential nomination tonight, breaking norms by doing so from a packed White House lawn during a pandemic https://t.co/9zIVm4unYO

name: politico
text: Spotted: The protest scene outside the White House tonight ahead of the last night of #RNC2020 (üì∑Getty) https://t.co/JJ4TZk8x5F

name: politico
text:
With Donald Trump down in the polls, Republicans are betting their political survival on convincing Americans that the U.S. has turned the corner on the coronavirus, and that Trump is the one leader who can deliver a vaccine in record-smashing time

https://t.co/3MlNiIojR8

name: politico
text: RT @ccadelago: McConnell saying he‚Äôs the only congressional leader not from NY or CA is a bit of a shot at McCarthy, whose hometown of Bakersfield more closely resembles many other cities in America than it does LA or SF.McConnell saying he‚Äôs the only congressional leader not from NY or CA is a bit of a shot at McCarthy, whose hometow‚Ä¶ https://t.co/Qewmt49DYw

name: politico
text: Ahead of #RNCConvention2020's final night of programming, crowds of Trump supporters ‚Äî the majority of whom appeared maskless ‚Äî gathered on the White House South Lawn in anticipation of the president‚Äôs headliner address later in the evening https://t.co/9zIVm4unYO

name: politico
text:
When Jacksonville was going to host the convention, the city persuaded the RNC to come there, in part, because Ultimate Fighting had used the arena during the pandemic, says @MarcACaputo.

The UFC safety protocols were going to be the backbone of the RNC
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text: RT @dlippman: Anthony @Scaramucci told me he has talked to 20 former White House and administration officials who plan to vote for Joe Biden but don‚Äôt want to speak publicly to avoid getting hit by Trump on Twitter. https://t.co/5ddFmRyqfp

name: politico
text: President Trump and the Republican Party are pitting themselves against LeBron James and Black athletes, as another police shooting of a Black man propels the country‚Äôs sports stars to a new level of political activism https://t.co/Wm3ZyNUp3k

name: politico
text:
#RNC2020 has been appealing to black voters all week.

But @PoliticoCharlie offers this reminder: Trump doesn‚Äôt have to do well with Black voters for the RNC to be a success. He just needs to pare down Biden‚Äôs margins in places like Milwaukee and Detroit
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
WH adviser Ja'Ron Smith praised Trump‚Äôs reaction to a series of murders of Black men this year that prompted protests over racial injustice and police violence, calling out Ahmaud Arbery, George Floyd and LeGend Taliferro by name.

More #RNC moments: https://t.co/T7DuH2nw2m https://t.co/mSERtA7EZ4

name: politico
text:
Smith has been an assistant to the president for domestic policy since April 2019.

And he cited Trump's record on prison reform and securing ‚Äúrecord and permanent‚Äù funding for HBCUs as evidence of his commitment to Black Americans https://t.co/9zIVm4unYO

name: politico
text:
Police union boss and NYC powerbroker Patrick Lynch delivers his RNC address.

The theme of policing and law and order has been more of a focus at the RNC than the coronavirus pandemic, says @politicoalex 
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
Rudy Giuliani delivers his RNC address.

@MarcACaputo says there‚Äôs some bad blood between Rudy and Joe Biden, who in 2007 said the former NYC Mayor‚Äôs speeches consisted of a ‚Äúsubject, verb and 9/11‚Äù
More live analysis:
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
Ben Carson gave the first words of empathy for the family of Jacob Blake:

"Our hearts go out to the Blake family," he said, later adding, "Necessary change comes through hope and love‚Äînot senseless and destructive violence."

More #RNCConvention moments https://t.co/s6xq8sNE7X https://t.co/ERxgxyQxMb

name: politico
text:
Tom Cotton, another potential 2024 candidate, takes the stage at the RNC. 

He‚Äôs been outspoken on China, and his speech comes right after the last video which was on China. He's trying to distinguish himself as a foreign policy hawk, says @politicoalex
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
Spotted at the #RNC2020: A Thin Blue Line flag in the background as Patrick Lynch, the top police union boss in NYC and Trump ally, speaks. 

(Live analysis: https://t.co/eGqNl1n8hl) https://t.co/lqs1KOnyko

name: politico
text:
McConnell used his #RNC speech to defend the work of his GOP caucus and argue against statehood for D.C.

(The Hous‚Ä¶ https://t.co/sAtFiTsujE

name: politico
text:
The parents of Kayla Mueller, a human rights activist killed by ISIS, delivered an emotional RNC speech tonight. They said that the Obama administration "showed more concern" for terrorists.

Biden's campaign may need to address this, says @PoliticoCharlie
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
Alice Johnson, a key player in Trump‚Äôs criminal justice reform push, delivered her RNC address tonight.

She‚Äôs been propped up as one of the most prominent beneficiaries of the terms of the First Step Act. Kim Kardashian played a role in her prison release
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text:
Ivanka Trump delivers her RNC address.

Like others, she addressed Trump's tweets: ‚ÄúI recognize that my dad‚Äôs communication style is not to everyone‚Äôs taste. And I know his Tweets can feel a bit ‚Ä¶ unfiltered. But the results speak for themselves‚Äù
https://t.co/tPyezt8iQP

name: politico
text: The wife of a retired police captain killed during looting in St. Louis gave an emotional recounting of her husband‚Ä¶ https://t.co/xhoyjxeOGv

text:
Trump begins his RNC address with remarks about Hurricane Laura, crediting FEMA, law enforcement and states he‚Äôll be visiting this weekend.
